item.title: Millions Of Americans Will Do Anything For Their Kids’ Sports, Including Cutting Church
item.description: Travel sports has grown into a $39 billion dollar industry while churches are seeing a decrease in members and Sunday worshippers.

item.title: How Trump Can Make The Auto Industry Great Again
item.description: Some of the world’s largest automakers may not survive our government-created debacle, but collapse of the industry can still be stopped.
